DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator aim verify whether consumption sheep cheese , naturally enrich ALA , CLA VA , would modify plasma lipid endocannabinoid profile mild hypercholesterolemic subject . This study 3-week , randomize , double blind , control , cross clinical trial , conduct State Hospital Brotzu Cagliari , Italy . The subject randomly assign eat 90g/d control enrich cheese 3 week , cross 3 week washout .
DOC.criteria: Adult volunteer diagnose mild hypercholesterolemia ( total cholesterol 220290 mg/dL ) Pregnant ( plan become pregnant study period ) lactate woman Also individual selfreported history diabetes , inflammatory bowel disease , pancreatitis , gallbladder biliary disease past 12 month , lactose intolerance screen visit . Those history cancer ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) 2 year screen , major trauma surgical event within 3 month screen . Volunteers follow characteristic also exclude : total cholesterol ≥300 mg/dL , serum triglyceride ≥250 mg/dL ≤ 200 mg/dL , *HDL ≥70mg/dL , BMI ≥ 30 uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure ≥160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure ≥100 mm Hg ) screening . Use lipidaltering medication supplement , anticoagulant , 2 week screen throughout study prohibit . Furthermore , select subject Apo E aplotype 3/3 , common Sardinia , order avoid variability cholesterolemia due different dietary response .
